vocabulary.name: AdmissionType
vocabulary.Description: A set of codes which indicates the circumstances under which the subject was or will be admitted. Table type: User

concept.displayName: Accident and emergency or dental casualty department of the Health Care Provider
GENERAL PRACTITIONER: after a request for immediate admission has been made direct to a Hospital Provider, i.e. not through a Bed bureau, by a GENERAL PRACTITIONER or deputy
Consultant Clinic, of this or another Health Care Provider
Transfer of any admitted PATIENT from other Hospital Provider other than in an emergency
The birth of a baby in this Health Care Provider
Baby born outside the Health Care Provider except when born at home as intended.
